survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Site Childcare Facilities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the quality, accessibility, and satisfaction with on-site childcare facilities provided by the company.

questions.question_text: Do you currently use the on-site childcare facilities provided by the company?
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment respondents into users and non-users of the childcare facilities.

script.question_text: Do you currently use the on-site childcare facilities provided by the company?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of care provided at the on-site childcare facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of care provided at the on-site childcare facilities?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the on-site childcare facilities do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allows multiple selections to identify key value drivers.

script.question_text: What aspects of the on-site childcare facilities do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare facilities?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback for improvement.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare facilities?

questions.question_text: If you do not use the on-site childcare facilities, what is the primary reason?
questions.client_notes: Helps identify barriers to usage for non-users.

script.question_text: If you do not use the on-site childcare facilities, what is the primary reason?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's on-site childcare facilities to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question to gauge overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's on-site childcare facilities to a colleague?
